titleStmt.title: George J. Rolston to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG11956

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: 37th - 76th Regiments Enrolled Militia Primary Source Documents (1861-1866)
msIdentifier.idno: Box 80, Folder 863 GREEN COUNTY Reccomendations for Nominations 46th Rgt. Ky. Militia

body.p:
Greensburg Nov 23d 1863
To his Exelency
Tho E Bramlette
Govenor of Ky
Sir I wood respectfully request that Mikle S Lile be appointed Lt Col of the 46 Ky militia he is Know acten as such

Yours &c
Geo J Rolston
Col H Q Ky M

Green Co Nov 23 -63
Geo Rolston
recommend for Lt Col of Militia
M. S. Lile
issue com
Refered to Inspector Genl
Tho E Bramlette
Recd I. G. O. Nov 26. 1863
